hours_text:
## Visiting the Museum

Museum Hours: Wednesday - Sunday 12-5 PM

GALLERIES CLOSE FOR INSTALLATION ON DECEMBER 8 AND WILL REOPEN JANUARY 17 @ 5:30 PM

Admission: Free for all visitors

## 

## **Directions and Parking**

We are adjacent to the University Center and Storke Plaza/Tower. Detailed walking and driving directions can be found [here](https://www.museum.ucsb.edu/about/visit/directions).

[Parking Lot #3 ](https://goo.gl/maps/LBFXJGw4PfhZD7oUA)\-- Available after 5 pm, and weekends

[Parking Lot #22](https://goo.gl/maps/7jRCJfqrREUw22hn8) \-- Available anytime

Guided Tours: Call 805-893-4320 or email [cbattle@ucsb.edu](mailto:cbattle@ucsb.edu?subject=Guided%20Tour%20Request)

Weekend Museum Entrance phone number: 805-893-5257

## Visiting the Architecture & Design Archives and the Art Collections

The Architecture and Design Collection is available by appointment only. Please contact [museum-adc@ucsb.edu](mailto:museum-adc@ucsb.edu) to schedule an appointment. Find [research appointment instructions here](/visit/research/collections). 

Works from the Art Collections may be studied in the [Museum Print Room](https://www.museum.ucsb.edu/visit/research/fine-arts-collection), available by appointment only. Please contact Susan Lucke, Collections Manager, at 805-893-4598.
